website_summaries.verdict: An essential replacement charging kit for the GamePad, with a standard USB connector that allows charging from any port.
pros: Enables users to charge the Wii U GamePad via a wall outlet, without having to turn on Wii U console
USB cable allows GamePad to be charged with any USB port
Comparable lifespan to the OEM Nintendo charger
cons: USB cable is shorter than original charging cable

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Deal!
customer_reviews.text: So glad to find this awesome deal. I didn’t think I was going to use the usb charger but it ended up being a great bonus. Both chargers work great! When it is not in use it is in the cradle hooked up to the usb charger and we use the regular charger for during play time. I think that is one thing that frayed the original plug in charger it came with, was all of the back and forth plugging it into base then unplugging it and plugging it into the pad.
customer_reviews.author: Kayo's Girl

customer_reviews.title: After 3 months, both chargers have stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: Among the options available, this was the best set of chargers I've found yet. However, the plastic on the cord is very thin, allowing the wires inside to be damaged. I suggest using electric tape to reinforce the end of the cord that attaches to the WiiU pad. If you use the charging stand, you will likely have no problems with this product. If you or your child play the WiiU while it is plugged in, consider reinforcing the cord.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Hano

customer_reviews.title: Unless you want a broken Wii U pad...
customer_reviews.text: Do not but this! After day three of using this charger our brand new Wii U pad had that was in a case and very well taken care of completely broke. Totally disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: To put it simply it charges the Wii U gamepad
customer_reviews.text: The Usb charge is nice if you have USB outlets/ports really available but not so much wall outlets. currently have them set up on opposite sides of the room so no matter where I am I can plug and play to my hearts content.
customer_reviews.author: Wintersfrozen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value & works beautifully
customer_reviews.text: Absolute life saver! My kids last charger was so old and broke . It finally gave out a few months ago. The kids started to play the switch instead, but missed playing their Wii and Wii u games. I was afraid of purchasing a charger that wasn't Nintendo brand, but this was an amazing purchase. Works very well and is sturdier than the expensive cord I bought from Nintendo. Also, it comes with a USB charger for the computer or to use with a wall plug.
customer_reviews.author: Devon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Replacement
customer_reviews.text: I bought this charger after purchasing a used a certified refurbished Wii U from "You know who" . About 5 days after I bought the console, we started having an issue with it so I bought this charger hoping that was the issue. It fixed the problem. We've had the charger for some time now and we haven't had a single problem with it. Also, this charger is longer than the one that came with the console. Major plus!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Montanez

customer_reviews.title: Too Short
customer_reviews.text: This cord is shorter than the original and does not connect properly. Our tablet takes longer to charge and watching while charging is annoying (due to the incomplete connection); the screen and red light blink. I wish we purchased a genuine Nintendo cable.
customer_reviews.author: Sara M. Urbano

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time and works
customer_reviews.text: Replaces the original and so far does its job, not much else to be said.
customer_reviews.author: Charlton E. Lester

customer_reviews.title: USB CABLE IS A MUST!!
customer_reviews.text: I have not tried the AC-DC charger brick yet. as ive searched on amazon, the possibility of these aftermarket power bricks to get hot and melt and FIRE AWWWW!!!.... is very very high!! but the USB cable and just using a standard ac- 5v dc USB brick, you get with your phone or table, is capable to charging your Wii U controller (apple idk, i hate apple). You can also use your laptop or desktop, or any USB connection to charge your Controller including the USB ports on the front of your Wii U, but the Console has to be running as too your laptop or desktop.. and of course you can use the cradle with this cradle.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: So so thickness
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately these aren't very tough, just like the original. After a couple years both have worn with the grey clipped in the middle and the white at the tip requiring force to charge. If kids don't use it I'm sure it'd be fine, but I'll never know.
customer_reviews.author: steveb944

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works well, Its been plugged in since it arrived on Dec-27-18. No issues. Between my daughter and I its played daily. The added bonus of the USB power cable is nice, its well made and works well also. 100% would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Smell

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for quite awhile now with multiple kids in my household using (abusing) it and it's still working great.
customer_reviews.author: SouthPaw

customer_reviews.title: Works as great as the original!
customer_reviews.text: Our entertainement center was hit by a power surge during a thunderstorm and fried all electronics, including our Wii U power brick. Luckily I was able to purchase this replacement and it works great. So glad I could find it here on Amazon because no local gaming shops had one.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie C.

customer_reviews.title: Short lived
customer_reviews.text: These charges worked great at first but they only lasted 3 months. They get to where they only work if the cable is just right but eventually quit working altogether.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My kids have really gotten their money’s worth out of their gaming system. Of course the cord finally died and we were happy to find out we could replace it easily and inexpensively. Seems to work just like the original cord. The USB is an added bonus we didn’t have before!
customer_reviews.author: HandleyMom

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Was skeptical at first as I don't normally buy knock offs of OEM products and such. Only purchased this one because it comes with two different methods to charge the Wii U tablet incase one of the two didn't work. My order came in, plugged it with my Wii U tablet and these babes work just like OEM product from Nintendo.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Vue

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I noticed the WiiU remote had stopped charging, even when I plugged it into the top port. I initially thought the battery itself crapped out, but of course it was the charger cord. I haven’t tried to USB cable yet, but for 2 cables at this price I thought it was a pretty good deal.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Prefect replacement
customer_reviews.text: Cable is over 6ft long and works perfect since the oem charger died. Comes with a usb cable that works in conjuction with any usb charging block. Oem chargers are nearly impossible to find since nintendo discontinued the wii u.
customer_reviews.author: joshua betts

customer_reviews.title: Arrived potentially damaged
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a plastic bag that had rips in it, gray item was dirty, looked like it’d had pencil marks or smudges on it and scratches. Haven’t tried it yet and will update review to reflect if it works properly or not, but was disappointed upon opening it.
customer_reviews.author: Alyson

customer_reviews.title: Two chargers that work.
customer_reviews.text: The wall charger feels cheaper and has a short cord, but we keep it plugged into the base charger so not a big issue. The USB charger feels higher quality and is LONG so that makes up for the short other one. USB is cool because it works with any phone charger or USB port we have tried it on.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Oppliger

customer_reviews.title: Will not last.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this about 6 months ago and used it like 10 times since then to charge the Wii U tablet. Now it it completely dead and will not work. You get what you pay for I suppose.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmad Elghazali

customer_reviews.title: Both plugs worked for me and I've been using um ...
customer_reviews.text: Both plugs worked for me and I've been using um for at least a month now with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Excellent AC & USb for the Wii U
customer_reviews.text: works great and fits perfectly, were currently using the ac part and saving the usb cord in case of issues in the future which is why this was a big plus. I would recommend if you need a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: M. Magee

customer_reviews.title: Love that it comes with 2 so you have backup
customer_reviews.text: I love that this comes with 2 so you have backup. I have already had to order 3. They are sensitive and didnt last very long but the fact that there is another one to rely on helped.
customer_reviews.author: Neda Essa

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Only been a couple of weeks, but working beautifully thus far. Replaced the battery first and found that I still couldn't get a charge. Tried the new cord and RED LIGHT, VIOLA! So hopefully it holds up over time. I'll update the review if it doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: M. Earley

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: My dog ate through our original cord and our Wii U wasn't charging anymore. Got this to replace them. I've been using the USB attachment cord for a couple months now and haven't had any problems. It charges great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a month
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cord and it stopped working after a month. I thought it was our controller, however, this cord would not work when tested on a second working controller.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Works great for the Wii-u game pad!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son as a replacement Wii-u game pad charger. Works great and has been since we purchased. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: JuniorBB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for what we needed. We couldn’t find the power cord to my sons Wii U. Ordered this hoping it would work out and it has!
customer_reviews.author: liz

customer_reviews.title: Wii U charges with no problem
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this plug 2 once due to the dog chewing the wire and now cause someone broke it excellent charger didn’t over heat or become hot still using now
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exact fit for Wii U
customer_reviews.text: The charging cable and power supply were a perfect replacement for my son's lost wires. It charges and provides power as it should.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Ling

customer_reviews.title: It works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Thanks goodness my son's Nintendo game came back to life. The power supply on the Original game stopped working. This replacement supply brought the game console back to life. Son is happy, dad is happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Kwan

customer_reviews.title: Works for my wii u
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my wii u. Our charging cable stopped working so I ordered this and it works great. It's nice that you get 2 chargers for the price of 1. Had it for 2 months now and still works!
customer_reviews.author: SDCA

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh 2.5 stars
customer_reviews.text: So I hat high hopes for this item . I give 2.5 stars The usb charger went out fast after a few uses. I issued exchange . Kinda a pain in the butt
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Charges, comes with USB-end cable
customer_reviews.text: Charges my Wii U gamepad without issues, exactly as one would expect. Bonus is that it came with a USB-end Wii U charger, so I can also just plug it into any USB brick or USB wall-port and charge it as well.
customer_reviews.author: CatsAndIT

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely worth it. Game stop had used cords for $15 what a joke... Just like a brand new cord that came with the Wii U. I Would purchase again if I needed to.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I've just received in the mail today, no burning smell, Gamepad is charging nicely. Great that it includes a usb version of the cable, you'll most likely need a power brick with a higher wattage to get the maximum charge from it. Will update this review again if I encounter any issues with it. 4 stars for quality. 5 stars if it survives a week/month/year.
customer_reviews.author: Draginto

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. Every several months my daughter breaks her Wii U adapter for some reason (this is actually the 2nd time I've bought an adapter). I expect her to break it again in about 4 to 5 months and will have to reorder again, and so I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Fredd

customer_reviews.title: There is a reason it includes two; the wall ...
customer_reviews.text: There is a reason it includes two; the wall charger quit working in less than a week. Will not be buying another from this retailer.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to go with a wii u that didnt have one too it. It works well and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: jenni

customer_reviews.title: As described by previous buyers this works perfectly as a ...
customer_reviews.text: As described by previous buyers this works perfectly as a Nintendo wiiu charger. The chord is a bit shorter than the original wiiu charger, but it doesn't make much of a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Work for what it is for. It’s been 6 months now and still works
customer_reviews.author: Klein

customer_reviews.title: Great product for Wii u
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Wii u because the original got lost and it works great
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Flores

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I’m always nervous buying replacement chargers, but this was inexpensive and has worked perfectly for my son’s Wii U game pad. We have been using it for awhile!
customer_reviews.author: LaLa

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: We needed another one, again, because my son is not exactly gentle with the cords! The WiiU rides again!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah2019

customer_reviews.title: Been using these chargers for about four months and they’re still going strong.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this set of chargers for about four months now, and they’re still working perfectly! I use one charger to plug into the charging cradle while I use the other one to charge while I play. I only wish I bought this sooner since this gives you so much bang for your buck. I’m completely satisfied with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Phong Pham

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. No issues.
customer_reviews.text: Been in use for a few weeks with no issues. In fact,it seems to charge my Wii u a bit faster than the original cord.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Charges my Wii U game pad as expected
customer_reviews.author: MD Dave

customer_reviews.title: Poor durability
customer_reviews.text: The durability is poor. The cords keep breaking. I now have to replace my charger again, for the 3rd time!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work great, i was mostly excited to get the USB ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work great, i was mostly excited to get the USB cable and it works just as well as the other charger
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable replacement
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect replacement for us. Our original charger broke all too quickly so we looked for an affordable replacement and came across these. We've used them for a few weeks now with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Leanna

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work great. It's a bit lighter and more delicate than ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work great. It's a bit lighter and more delicate than my old Nintendo brand charger, however. I would recommend reenforcing the ends of the charger with a bit of electrical tape.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Worked Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I've moved a number of times - poor choices in roommates and boyfriends - which leads to lots of packing. Long story short, my wii cord was MIA once I reached my most recent destination. Boom. Here we are, worked great, happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Kwiatkowski

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement!
customer_reviews.text: Great adapter, fits well so dont be nervous! Both cords do their job. USB charger is great addition to charging options. I would buy again should I accidentally vaccum up these cords as well!
customer_reviews.author: mamamia

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a replacement power adapter since mine died on me randomly. Seems to be made out of the same material as the original, but I'm no materials expert.
customer_reviews.author: Finalchrono

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement charging cord
customer_reviews.text: Works great, charges our wii u gamepad. Fits tightly and love the extra cord as a 2nd charging spot or just a backup.
customer_reviews.author: momof2cuties

customer_reviews.title: Broke
customer_reviews.text: Charger broke so fast. I would just buy the name brand next time.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Cat Meow

customer_reviews.title: best price and it works perfect every time
customer_reviews.text: this is our second time buying this product. we have a fat cat that loves cords. best price and it works perfect every time
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly A

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect, value for the money although not original so treat it with care
customer_reviews.author: Yansel Rosario

customer_reviews.title: Works great for wiiu replacement charger
customer_reviews.text: Works great, best value I could find for a wiiu charger replacement.
customer_reviews.author: A. Glance

customer_reviews.title: It is charging our Wii u pad!!!
customer_reviews.text: Our Wii u pad wouldn't not charge with the OEM so we bought this hopeful we could get it to charge. it is working so far.
customer_reviews.author: m

customer_reviews.title: Nintendo charger finally died, great replacement
customer_reviews.text: Works great as a replacement to the officially licensed Nintendo charger. I like that this is a wall charger/USB combo, especially at a reasonable price. Very pleased and would order again.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Our charger cord was shut in a foot stool and damaged. Trying to explain to our son you don't have to have your wiiu plugged in to play. Lesson learned. This replacement is just great!
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This saved us from buying a new gamepad... wonderful purchase
customer_reviews.author: Christy L

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should
customer_reviews.text: The addition of the USB charger cable makes it easier for additional charging options
customer_reviews.author: Smile :)

customer_reviews.title: A good price deal
customer_reviews.text: A good price deal. The usb cable didnt wprk right when the gamepad was already critically low plugged into wii u. Once it was charged to 2 bars via AC, it worked fine again. The AC cable has had no problems. The AC cord is normal length. The USB is very long. A good deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works and hasn't broke!
customer_reviews.text: works with my WiiU and has yet to break. I thought my wiiU port was broken, because my old cord was loose and it was finnicky while charging, but this cord fits perfectly and charges very fast. Satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Dazzle

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase item as expected. Works for our Wii U with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jen719

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Good price for both...very durable...have held up to my wild boys
customer_reviews.author: ladyheather821

customer_reviews.title: it works
customer_reviews.text: It connects to the dock and charges the pad. So it's good.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: The cord is just as described and what we needed to replace the old cord.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly C. Hunter

customer_reviews.title: easy purchase
customer_reviews.text: what a fast easy well priced purchase. I am a very happy camper
customer_reviews.author: Lorna

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact it's 2 cords, saved one as a back up. Had for a month now with no issues
customer_reviews.author: Selizthorn

customer_reviews.title: Quality.
customer_reviews.text: Our original charger stopped working. We thought the Wii U was done. This charger brought it back!! So happy that we can still use the Wii U.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Finally a peace of mind!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect replacement for the original charger after wear and tear of the old one. My 10 yo was very happy to have two cords to charge his gamepad. Now he can stop bugging me and I can have some me time.
customer_reviews.author: ladyv

customer_reviews.title: Replaced original AC
customer_reviews.text: Replaced original cat chewed AC adapter cord, been working as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: TV Man

customer_reviews.title: Failed after 6 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Worked for a month and a half. Then stopped working. The one good thing is an extra long usb cord i can use to charge it with.
customer_reviews.author: Eddiemlo

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement charger
customer_reviews.text: Product as described and works great. Couldn't find a replacement charger for my kids Wii U after dog chewed the cord in half. This product shipped quickly and works great. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement.
customer_reviews.text: As described, on time, and it works so far as I know, as it wasn't for me.
customer_reviews.author: sandymom

customer_reviews.title: Two chargers for the price of one: great deal!
customer_reviews.text: My last charger was eaten by my cats, but this replacement works perfectly. Plus, by having a second charging option, I don't have to worry if something happens to the charger again.
customer_reviews.author: Marnie

customer_reviews.title: They work great and a long
customer_reviews.text: Due to my boisterous game playing I have bought several chargers from this dealer. They work great and a long! I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My little sister broke her Wi U charger and needed one right alway. I wasn't to sure if I should buy on from here or the Game Stop store. I risked it and bought one here due to having it at a better price. This change has been working just fine and it came with the laptop USB charger.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin More

customer_reviews.title: It is probably a great product, unfortunately it does not work with my ...
customer_reviews.text: It is probably a great product, unfortunately it does not work with my Wii. I will have to check around for another plug. Seller shipped in a timely manner, without incident
customer_reviews.author: Claudia M Leonard

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: One of the items we needed, but it’s the power cord not the charger so title and description needs to be updated.
customer_reviews.author: Gamingmama

customer_reviews.title: Solved my problem.
customer_reviews.text: Connection was not tight. Now it charges like a champ.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recued our WiiU controller
customer_reviews.text: Our WiiU controller would not charge anymore despite having a replaced battery. The new cable fixed the problem, which saved us time and money hunting down a replacement controller.
customer_reviews.author: NW family

customer_reviews.title: I recommend
customer_reviews.text: They work and having 2 chargers is great for the price.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kids can again play their Wii U!!! A definite blessing when the cable is out.

customer_reviews.title: Compatible
customer_reviews.text: This product is very reliable and compatible with our wiiu

customer_reviews.title: Works great so far
customer_reviews.text: Works great so far. I have charged my Wii U Gamepad several times and no problems. This is a must buy if your original charger bit the dust like mine did!

customer_reviews.title: Austor Charger Kit for Wii U GamePad
customer_reviews.text: No problems with the product this far. Shipping was fast!

customer_reviews.text: Quality is just as good as OEM from Nintendo, plus you get a USB ended cable to boot. Great replacement. (My 4 year old took scissors to the original cord, so having an extra backup is a great thing.)

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: The cables are in great condition, my husband has no complaints.

customer_reviews.text: Pretty decent quality. Not the same as Nintendo brand, but works well enough to not spend the price for name brand z

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: both work perfectly and were shipped as soon as i bought them

customer_reviews.title: Great charger

product_meta.title: Austor Charger Kit for Wii U Gamepad - Supply AC Adapter Charging Cable with Charger Cord for Nintendo Wii U Gamepad
product_meta.description:
Ideal quality replacement bundle or as a spare for Nintendo Wii U Gamepad, have been tested to achieve the same optimum charging time and output of the original 

Features 
AC Adapter Input: 100-240V 50/60Hz; Output: 4.75V/1.6A 
Charger Cable length: 110cm, USB cable length: 3m 

Package include 

1 x US Plug AC Adapter Charger for Nintendo Wii U GamePad 
1 x 3m Charger Cord for Nintendo Wii U GamePad
feature_bullets: Ideal quality replacement bundle or as a spare for Nintendo Wii U Gamepad, have been tested to achieve the same optimum charging time and output of the original
Durable power adapter and USB charge cable allows you to have maximum portability and game time, seamless plug and play charging, extended life guarantee
Charger Cable length: 110cm, USB Cable length: 3m
Compatible with Nintendo Wii U GamePad controller

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars716 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
